text: dangnan phu thi xyu bn hlakthan xan chad cæng cak phracea khxng khea læa phu pen phyan cak phraxngkh ca sathyay man læa kxn nan mi khamphir khx ngmu sa pen næwthang læa pen metta chn hela nan sraththa tx man læa phu dı cak phrrkh tang «ptiseth sraththa tx man fi nrk khux sayya khxng khea dangnan cea xya di xyu nı kar sngsay man ley thæcring man pen sacthrrm cak phracea khxng cea tæthwa mnusʹy swn hıy ca mi sraththa
